about_the_game:
Tekling is a challenging body-shifting 2D platformer. Jump and dodge your way through 70+ levels of frenetic gameplay of other challenging platformers like Super Meat boy and Megaman.

Mild mannered Jack the pizza delivery boy's life changed forever when he was infected with super powered nanites. Now with the aid of exotic particles he can turn into Tekling, a mighty robot hero who must collect these strange particles to save the populace. In each area Jack must use his pathetic jumping and running skills to collect three exotic particles which turns him into the super powered Tekling who can jump twice as high, use amazing abilities and even jump and climb walls. Avoid deadly obstacles, collect the power-ups and become a hero.

Tekling was built by adults on the autism spectrum at the nonPareil Institute.
detailed_description:
Tekling is a challenging body-shifting 2D platformer. Jump and dodge your way through 70+ levels of frenetic gameplay of other challenging platformers like Super Meat boy and Megaman.

Mild mannered Jack the pizza delivery boy's life changed forever when he was infected with super powered nanites. Now with the aid of exotic particles he can turn into Tekling, a mighty robot hero who must collect these strange particles to save the populace. In each area Jack must use his pathetic jumping and running skills to collect three exotic particles which turns him into the super powered Tekling who can jump twice as high, use amazing abilities and even jump and climb walls. Avoid deadly obstacles, collect the power-ups and become a hero.

Tekling was built by adults on the autism spectrum at the nonPareil Institute.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 210 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 210 GB available space

name: Tekling

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Nvidia videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 210 MB available space

short_description: Become a robot, save the world. Jump and dodge your way through 70+ levels of frenetic gameplay in the same vein of super meet boy and megaman. Collect the orbs to transform from frail human into mighty Tekling, defender of the innocent and enemy to exploding barrels everywhere.
